content: That's really helpful! I think I'll go with a combination of a paper-based system and digital tracking. I'll use a bill organizer with a calendar to track due dates and a spreadsheet to store receipts and payment confirmations. I'll also set reminders on my digital calendar to ensure I don't miss any payments. One thing I'm still unsure about is how to organize my digital files. Do you have any tips on how to create a folder structure for my documents, and how to name my files in a way that makes them easy to find?
